markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Mapping the Archipelago: Tikawara | conc = | next = Mapping the Archipelago: The Burning Shoals | internalname = 03_QST_Cartographer_Three | guid = 1ddcdacb-f0a3-4db6-b642-dad98061b752 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Sanza](/sanza/), the excitable cartographer in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. He asks the Watcher to do it. ## Walkthrough * This takes you far southwest and you'll need to explore the [Ruins of Amira's Roost](/ruinsOfAmirasRoost/) and the [Sandswept ruins](/sandsweptRuins/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_QST_Cartographer_Three.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Mapping the Archipelago: West Wakara Reef''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Sanza, the excitable cartographer I met in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. I've made some progress, but there is still much to explore. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the islands far to the southwest of Neketaka.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza, the cartographer in Queen's Berth, asked me to make a survey of the uncharted islands of the Deadfire Archipelago. We've made some headway, but there's more to do. Sanza has asked me to survey the islands far to the southwest, west of the Wakara Reef and the Kangati Islands. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I found an island of overgrown jungle, and on it an ancient Huana ruin overrun by lagufaeth. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | Upon a desert island, I found a Huana ruin, filled with deadly traps. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have filled in the southwestern quadrant of my map. Sanza will be eager to hear of my progress. I can find him in his shop in Queen's Berth in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I mapped the islands west of the Wakara Reef, and returned to Sanza with the information. |} ## Trivia * This quest's fail state is incorrectly marked as not failed (although this has no effect, since killing Sanza fails the quest anyway).

He asks the Watcher to do it. ==Walkthrough== * This takes you far southwest and you'll need to explore the [[Ruins of Amira's Roost]] and the [[Sandswept ruins]]. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_QST_Cartographer_Three.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Mapping the Archipelago: West Wakara Reef''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Sanza, the excitable cartographer I met in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. I've made some progress, but there is still much to explore. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the islands far to the southwest of Neketaka.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza, the cartographer in Queen's Berth, asked me to make a survey of the uncharted islands of the Deadfire Archipelago. We've made some headway, but there's more to do. Sanza has asked me to survey the islands far to the southwest, west of the Wakara Reef and the Kangati Islands. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I found an island of overgrown jungle, and on it an ancient Huana ruin overrun by lagufaeth. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | Upon a desert island, I found a Huana ruin, filled with deadly traps. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have filled in the southwestern quadrant of my map. Sanza will be eager to hear of my progress. I can find him in his shop in Queen's Berth in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I mapped the islands west of the Wakara Reef, and returned to Sanza with the information. |} ==Trivia== * This quest's fail state is incorrectly marked as not failed (although this has no effect, since killing Sanza fails the quest anyway).
title: Mapping the Archipelago: West Wakara Reef
